visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a pie chart with the following specifications: Chart type: pie, Chart title: 'Browser Market Share', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark background with white text for labels and titles, Data series: Include the following data series - ['Firefox', 45.0], ['IE', 26.8], ['Chrome', 12.8, true, true], ['Safari', 8.5], ['Opera', 6.2], ['Others', 0.7], Custom colors: Use specific colors for each slice - ['#ff9900', '#0073e6', '#33cc33', '#ff3333', '#9966cc', '#666666'], Additional configurations: Set the chart background to dark gray, enable data labels with a white color, and configure the legend to be positioned at the bottom of the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a pie chart with a dark gray background, suitable for a dark theme. The chart title is set to 'Browser Market Share' with white text to ensure readability against the dark background. The data series includes browser market share data, with specific colors assigned to each slice of the pie chart. Data labels are enabled and styled with white text to contrast with the dark background. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart and also uses white text for consistency. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative pie chart.
